result.eng: Communism was on its last legs in 1989.
result.ga: Bhí an cumannachas ar an dé deiridh i 1989
result.orig: Bhí an cumannachas ar an dé deiridh i 1989
result.html: Bhí an cumannachas ar an dé deiridh i 1989Communism was on its last legs in 1989.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an cumannaċas ar an dé deiriḋ i 1989Communism was on its last legs in 1989.

result.eng: The poor old woman is on her last legs.
result.ga: Tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridh
result.orig: Tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridh
result.html: Tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridhThe poor old woman is on her last legs.
result.ponchtml: Tá an tseanḃean ḃoċt ar an dé deiriḋThe poor old woman is on her last legs.

result.eng: Their legs were splashing about in the cool water.
result.ga: Bhí a gcosa ag lapadaíl san uisce fionnuair
result.orig: Bhí a gcosa ag lapadaíl san uisce fionnuair
result.html: Bhí a gcosa ag lapadaíl san uisce fionnuairTheir legs were splashing about in the cool water.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a gcosa ag lapadaíl san uisce fionnuairTheir legs were splashing about in the cool water.
